text: Peter Planch Madsen (born 26 April 1978) is a retired Danish professional footballer. He played as a striker. He played 13 games and scored three goals for the Danish national team, and Madsen was part of the Danish squad at the 2002 FIFA World Cup and 2004 European Championship tournaments.
